tool_description: A collection of tools  that allows you gather useful information about your customers. We provide IP to Host (PTR) and Host to IP (A, AAAA, CNAME) resolution in DNS, IP/IPv6, AS, Domain WHOIS lookup as well as location information based on IP or host name via GeoIP2 database.
name: NetTools
title: NetTools

api_list.name: reverse
api_list.description: Resolve a host name associated with an IP record

api_list.name: whois
api_list.description: Query whois information by IP, AS or Domain Name

optional_parameters.name: filterRaw
optional_parameters.description: Filter the WHOIS server's RAW reply

api_list.name: resolve
api_list.description: Resolve an IP address associated with a host

api_list.name: locate
api_list.description: Get location information for $query, which can either be a resolvable DNS record or a valid, public IP address.

api_list.name: getCountry
api_list.description: Get country information for the $query, which can be either a valid, public IP address, or a resolvable host name.

api_list.name: whereAmI
api_list.description: Shows the location information for the IP address that sends the request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nettools.p.rapidapi.com/locate/whereami"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nettools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nettools.p.rapidapi.com/locate/whereami"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nettools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
